From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::RebelYell::
RebelYell grumbled to himself as he worked. This is
not the kind of work he enjoyed. "I'm a soldier, not a
slaggin' maintenance bot!" he thought. Still, he
admitted this ship had taken quite a beating, and if
repairs werent done soon theres no way it would hold
up under fire. So RebelYell decided to keep his
complaints to himself. And besides, after this, he
would kill some Preds one way or the other, even if he
had to go look for the Pred base himself.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
>

> need all the help they could get. "Hi Guys, there's
> lots of work to 
> do and we could really use the help.  If anyone
> knows how to repair 
> autoguns, they really are beat up."
>
